value.title: AI expert taps UN officials to learn how to build a global AI regulatory body
value.excerpt: Gary Marcus, a cognitive scientist and expert on AI, said he's consulting with people in the UN and UNESCO about how to create a global AI regulatory agency.

value.title: Eric Schmidt On Synthetic Biology, AI, Ethics And The Bioeconomy’s ‘Seismic Shift’
value.excerpt: Eric Schmidt at the SynBioBeta conference. You mentioned the Bioeconomy Moonshot as a way to drive progress in biotech. What recent developments or advancements in synthetic biology are you most excited about?

value.title: Playing with fire: How to adapt to the new realities of AI
value.excerpt: AI is a disruptive force that will change the world. But for AI and humanity to thrive, we must be mindful of risks and properly manage them.

value.title: Europe eyes strict rules for artificial intelligence
value.excerpt: No HAL 9000s or Ultrons on this continent, thank you very much. The European Union wants to avoid the worst of what artificial intelligence can do — think creepy facial recognition tech and many, many Black Mirror episodes — while still trying to boost ...

value.title: Google told me Bard has gotten better. But even the AI doesn't believe ...
value.excerpt: Even after Google I/O, Bard seems to be holding on to some of its old quirks, even denying its upgrade to PaLM 2.

value.title: To my fellow Gen Xers worried AI is going to take your job: Take a chill pill
value.excerpt: "Will AI take my job" is a question on many minds lately, especially for Gen X. Instead of panicking, boost your career by learning to adapt.

value.title: How a Toronto computer chip maker is providing the better brains AI runs on
value.excerpt: From its downtown Toronto HQ, Untether is designing the computer chips that run artificial intelligence programs more efficiently.

value.title: Deepfakes, porn tapes, bots: How AI has shaped a vital NATO ally's presidential election
value.excerpt: One candidate already dropped out of the race after an alleged sex tape surfaced on social media, but the candidate claimed it was the product of deepfake technology.

value.title: Developer creates pro-First Amendment AI to counter ChatGPT's 'political motivations'
value.excerpt: ChatGPT has political biases when answering questions, opening the door for competition whose models provide objectivity in their answers, an AI developer said.

value.title: AI, verification and impacts on commercial due diligence
value.excerpt: AI has loudly announced itself, offering enterprises exciting potential. Why due diligence, verification and vetting are essential.

value.title: Hear Reddit co-founder’s response when asked if Government is equipped to regulate AI
value.excerpt: Reddit co-founder Alexis Ohanian joins CNN's Chris Wallace to discuss artificial intelligence and if the Government is equipped to regulate it.

value.title: Forbes magazine’s new majority owner is a 28-year-old billionaire who made his money in self-driving car tech

value.title: GXO Direct To Rely On Machine Learning To Drive Labor Efficiencies
value.excerpt: GXO Direct has invested in a machine learning labor management system from Blue Yonder to help drive labor productivity at their warehouses. Traditionally, industrial engineers were widely used to set fair labor standards.

value.title: Snapchat influencer launches an AI-powered 'virtual girlfriend' to help 'cure loneliness'
value.excerpt: Called CarynAI, the chatbot is described on its website as a "virtual girlfriend." It allows Marjorie's fans to "enjoy private, personalized conversations" with an AI version of the influencer, the chatbot's website states.

value.title: Wes Anderson’s Harry Potter? All the AI Wes Anderson parodies, ranked
value.excerpt: Wes Anderson's Star Wars? The rise of AI-generated images has triggered many mash-ups of the director's style with popular franchises. We rank them all.

value.title: AI-powered code suggestions and security scans in Amazon SageMaker notebooks using Amazon CodeWhisperer and Amazon CodeGuru
value.excerpt: Amazon SageMaker comes with two options to spin up fully managed notebooks for exploring data and building machine learning (ML) models. The first option is fast start, collaborative notebooks accessible within Amazon SageMaker Studio—a fully integrated development environment (IDE) for machine learning.

value.title: Stability AI releases an open source text-to-animation tool
value.excerpt: On Thursday, Stability AI, the AI company that created Stable Diffusion, unveiled a text-to-animation tool that allows developers and artists to use Stable Diffusion models to generate animations.

value.title: Humans in the Loop: AI & Machine Learning in the Bloomberg Terminal
value.excerpt: The Bloomberg Terminal provides access to more than 35 million financial instruments across all asset classes. That's a lot of data, and to make it useful, AI and machine learning (ML) are playing an increasingly central role in the Terminal's ongoing evolution.

value.title: Metaspectral Says Using AI And Computer Vision Can Monitor Environmental Hazards
value.excerpt: This company belives that artificial intelligence and computer vision can be used to monitor for environmental hazards.

value.title: Perrone Robotics rolling out self-driving shuttle program for colleges and universities
value.excerpt: The “Auto Campus” program will allow students to get to their day to day activities through self-driving shuttles.

value.title: AI-Run ETF Dumps Apple In Favor Of This Chip Stock And Hints At New Opportunity Brewing In Market
value.excerpt: QRAFT AI-Enhanced U.S. Large Cap Momentum ETF (NYSE:AMOM) had a 7.96% of its portfolio’s weight in Apple in April but sold the entire stake in May. Incidentally, Apple was the fund's top holding in April.

value.title: Triumph Tech CEO: AWS Will Win ‘AI War’ Vs. Google, Microsoft
value.excerpt: Generative AI market of Amazon, Google and Microsoft’s OpenAI ChatGPT will be won by AWS due to the cloud company’s artificial intelligence customization and scalability, says Triumph Technology Solutions CEO.

value.title: Esperanto Sees A Bright Future For RISC-V In AI And HPC
value.excerpt: Esperanto has shared key findings of three customer trials conducted last year. Customer “A” demonstrated linear scaling from a single chip to a cluster. Customer “B” demonstrated strong performance and power efficiency vs the NVIDIA A100, and Customer “C” saw very strong performance across hundreds of evaluation parameters.

value.title: Unlock Insights from your Amazon S3 data with intelligent search
value.excerpt: Amazon Kendra is an intelligent search service powered by machine learning (ML). Amazon Kendra reimagines enterprise search for your websites and applications so your employees and customers can easily find the content they’re looking for, even when it’s scattered across multiple locations and content
